page.title: 07 GHOSTS
page.content: So far there are three known ghosts in IVER HEATH.The first one is called LADY LILLIAN who lives in a hundred year old house which is now used for malajusted boys.It is called DROMENAGH SCHOOL.So far three people have seen her.I myself and two other people.The second poltergeist is in a friend of mines bedroom.The poltergeist turns on the radio when it is not plugged in or has not got any batteries in.The last one is in my house.It is all over the top floor of our house.It smashed my sisters glass stereo case twice, chucked her alarm clock at her ,hides my computer tapes,spreads toothpaste in our bath,and generally scares the life out of us.Where my friend and I live our whole street is built on a graveyard. BY NATHANIEL TURNER and GERARD HARRIS
